about_the_game:
Created by Riley D. Owens (aka Darkwoulfe), this product consists of 25 top-down uniquely designed, 3d rendered tokens, depicting heroes, villains and monsters. You can use these to replace the letter tokens or built-in tokens in many popular adventure modules. Just unlock the encounters and drag these over top or drag them over top of the listing in your combat tracker.

This Token Pack includes:

  • Ankheg
  • Anxious Player
  • Axe Fighter
  • Bat in Flight
  • Beltram
  • Centipede
  • Dual Wield Ranger
  • Elven Archer
  • Fighter with Scimitar
  • Ghost Spider
  • Hardened Fighter 1
  • Kenku with khopesh
  • Kenku with staff
  • Kru-Knid Ambusher
  • Kru-Knid Attacker
  • Manticoid Archer
  • Manticoid Martial Artist
  • Manticoid Mystic
  • Manticoid Spearman
  • Manticoid Warrior
  • Master Drayven Stahl
  • Maverick Player
  • Necromancer
  • Southern Fighter
  • Tierfling Player

Requires: A Fantasy Grounds full or ultimate license or an active subscription and any Ruleset.
detailed_description:
Created by Riley D. Owens (aka Darkwoulfe), this product consists of 25 top-down uniquely designed, 3d rendered tokens, depicting heroes, villains and monsters. You can use these to replace the letter tokens or built-in tokens in many popular adventure modules. Just unlock the encounters and drag these over top or drag them over top of the listing in your combat tracker.

This Token Pack includes:

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
